typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct GemStepStorage.SourceConfig storage ref)

documentation.text:
@notice Batched public constants as a fixed array to avoid large tuples.
 @dev Layout (16 items):
 [0]=INITIAL_SUPPLY
 [1]=REWARD_RATE_BASE
 [2]=SECONDS_PER_MONTH
 [3]=MAX_REWARD_RATE
 [4]=PERCENTAGE_BASE
 [5]=DEFAULT_SIGNATURE_VALIDITY
 [6]=MAX_SIGNATURE_VALIDITY
 [7]=MIN_BURN_AMOUNT
 [8]=MIN_STEPS
 [9]=ANOMALY_THRESHOLD
 [10]=MIN_AVERAGE_FOR_ANOMALY
 [11]=GRACE_PERIOD
 [12]=MAX_PROOF_LENGTH
 [13]=MAX_VERSION_LENGTH
 [14]=TARGET_STAKE_PERCENT
 [15]=MONTHLY_MINT_LIMIT

@notice Get role identifiers as a fixed array (kept separate to shrink ABI tuples).
 @dev Layout (7 items):
 [0]=PAUSER_ROLE
 [1]=MINTER_ROLE
 [2]=SIGNER_ROLE
 [3]=PARAMETER_ADMIN_ROLE
 [4]=EMERGENCY_ADMIN_ROLE
 [5]=UPGRADER_ROLE
 [6]=API_SIGNER_ROLE
